item.text: From the elder, to Gaius my dear brother, whom I love in truth.

<st data-num="27">Dear friend</st>, I <st data-num="2172" class="">pray</st> <st data-num="4012" class="">that</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> may <st data-num="2137" class="">go well</st> with <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> that you may be in <st data-num="5198">good health</st>, <st data-num="2531">just as</st> it is <st data-num="2137" class="">well</st> with <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="5590" class="">soul</st>.<n id="1" />
For I rejoiced greatly when the brothers came and testified to your truth, just as you are living according to the truth.
I have no greater joy than this: to hear that my children are living according to the truth.
Dear friend, you demonstrate faithfulness by whatever you do for the brothers (even though they are strangers).

<st data-num="3739">They</st><n id="1" /> have <st data-num="3140" class="">testified</st> to <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="26" class="">love</st> <st data-num="1799" class="">before</st> the <st data-num="1577" class="">church</st>.<n id="2" /> You will <st data-num="4160" class="">do</st> <st data-num="2573" class="">well</st> to <st data-num="4311" class="">send</st> <st data-num="3739">them</st> <st data-num="4311" class="">on</st> their <st data-num="4311" class="">way</st> <st data-num="516">in a manner worthy</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>.<n id="3" />

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> they have <st data-num="1831">gone forth</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="5228">on behalf of</st> “The <st data-num="3686" class="">Name</st>,”<n id="2" /> <st data-num="2983" class="">accepting</st> <st data-num="3367" class="">nothing</st> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="1482" class="">pagans</st>.<n id="3" />
Therefore we ought to support such people so that we become coworkers in cooperation with the truth.
I wrote something to the church, but Diotrephes, who loves to be first among them, does not acknowledge us.

<st data-num="1223 3778">Therefore</st>, <st data-num="1437" class="">if</st> I <st data-num="2064" class="">come</st>,<n id="1" /> I will <st data-num="5279">call attention</st> to the <st data-num="2041" class="">deeds</st> he is <st data-num="4160" class="">doing</st><n id="2" />—the bringing of <st data-num="5396">unjustified charges against</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st> with <st data-num="4190" class="">evil</st> <st data-num="3056" class="">words</st>! <st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> <st data-num="3361">not</st> being <st data-num="714" class="">content</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">with</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">that</st>, he <st data-num="3777" class="">not</st> only refuses to <st data-num="1926" class="">welcome</st> the <st data-num="80" class="">brothers</st> himself, <st data-num="2532" class="">but</st> <st data-num="2967" class="">hinders</st> the people who want to do <st data-num="1014" class="">so</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1544" class="">throws</st> them <st data-num="1544" class="">out</st> <st data-num="1537">of</st> the <st data-num="1577" class="">church</st>!
Dear friend, do not imitate what is bad, but what is good. The one who does good is of God; the one who does what is bad has not seen God.
Demetrius has been testified to by all, even by the truth itself. We also testify to him, and you know that our testimony is true.
I have many things to write to you, but I do not wish to write to you with pen and ink.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> I <st data-num="1679" class="">hope</st> to <st data-num="1492" class="">see</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="2112">right away</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> we will <st data-num="2980" class="">speak</st> <st data-num="4750" class="">face</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="4750" class="">face</st>.<n id="1" /> (1:15) <st data-num="1515" class="">Peace</st> be with <st data-num="4771">you</st>.<n id="2" /> The <st data-num="5384">friends</st> here<n id="3" /> <st data-num="782">greet</st> <st data-num="4771">you</st>. <st data-num="782">Greet</st> the <st data-num="5384">friends</st><n id="4" /> there<n id="5" /> <st data-num="2596">by</st> <st data-num="3686">name</st>.
